attributes.action: I want to bring back emergency driving tests for key workers during lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: It will allow key workers to get to work without being restricted by bus times and will make sure less people are using public transport to help stop the spread
attributes.background: I want the government to bring back emergency driving tests for critical workers so that more people can continue to work during the covid 19 restrictions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
